name: Sylvain Haché
what_you_do: Sylvain Haché is an award-winning musician, speaker trainer, and marketing consultant.
social_proof: Award-winning musician, helped people from 18 to 81 years old overcome stage fright, replace yearly incomes with 20-minute talks, and generate multiple 6-figure days from the stage.
business_focus: Sylvain Haché helps business owners, experts, and speakers master public speaking and marketing.
